ref: 6698 dvyardha ʻ one and a half ʼ Sūryap. 2. *dviyardha -- . 3. *dvaiyardha -- . 4. *duvardha -- . 5. *dauvardha -- . [dvi -- and *du -- 2, ardhá -- 2.
